chapter.title: Resource Adaptor Implementation
chapter.para: The RA implementation is adoptation of Java Call Control API (JCC 1.1) for the requirements of Jain SLEE. Any specific JCC providers can be injected into the Resource Adaptor. The &THIS.PLATFORM; development teams provides implementation of the JCC for Customised Applications for Mobile networks Enhanced Logic (CAMEL) based on Mobicents SS7 solution.
